callee: SELECT "catalogue_option"."id", "catalogue_option"."name", "catalogue_option"."code", "catalogue_option"."type", "catalogue_option"."required", "catalogue_option"."option_group_id", "catalogue_option"."help_text", "catalogue_option"."order" FROM "catalogue_option" LEFT OUTER JOIN "catalogue_productclass_options" ON ("catalogue_option"."id" = "catalogue_productclass_options"."option_id") LEFT OUTER JOIN "catalogue_product_product_options" ON ("catalogue_option"."id" = "catalogue_product_product_options"."option_id") WHERE ("catalogue_productclass_options"."productclass_id" = 438 OR "catalogue_product_product_options"."product_id" = 631) ORDER BY "catalogue_option"."order" ASC, "catalogue_option"."name" ASC
